verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician אַל־ תַּ֭שְׁחֵת <S%H516><s%> Altaschith לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִכְתָּ֑ם <S%H4387><s%> Michtam בְּבָרְח֥וֹ <S%H1272><s%> when he fled מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> from שָׁ֝א֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul בַּמְּעָרָֽה׃ <S%H4631><s%> in the cave חָנֵּ֤נִי <S%H2603><s%> Be merciful אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> unto me O God חָנֵּ֗נִי <S%H2603><s%> be merciful כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בְךָ֮ חָסָ֪יָה <S%H2620><s%> trusteth נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> unto me for my soul וּבְצֵֽל־ <S%H6738><s%> in thee yea in the shadow כְּנָפֶ֥יךָ <S%H3671><s%> of thy wings אֶחְסֶ֑ה <S%H2620><s%> will I make my refuge עַ֝֗ד <S%H5704><s%> Until יַעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> be overpast הַוּֽוֹת׃ <S%H1942><s%> until [these] calamities
אֶ֭קְרָא <S%H7121><s%> I will cry לֵֽאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> unto God עֶלְי֑וֹן <S%H5945><s%> most high לָ֝אֵ֗ל <S%H410><s%> unto God גֹּמֵ֥ר <S%H1584><s%> that performeth עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

יִשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> He shall send מִשָּׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וְֽיוֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <S%H3467><s%> and save חֵרֵ֣ף <S%H2778><s%> me [from] the reproach שֹׁאֲפִ֣י <S%H7602><s%> of him that would swallow me up סֶ֑לָה <S%H5542><s%> Selah יִשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> shall send forth אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God חַסְדּ֥וֹ <S%H2617><s%> his mercy וַאֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H571><s%> and his truth

נַפְשִׁ֤י ׀ <S%H5315><s%> My soul בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [is] among לְבָאִם֮ <S%H3833><s%> lions אֶשְׁכְּבָ֪ה <S%H7901><s%> [and] I lie לֹ֫הֲטִ֥ים <S%H3857><s%> [even among] them that are set on fire בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [even] the sons אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of men שִׁ֭נֵּיהֶם <S%H8127><s%> whose teeth חֲנִ֣ית <S%H2595><s%> [are] spears וְחִצִּ֑ים <S%H2671><s%> and arrows וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <S%H3956><s%> and their tongue חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword חַדָּֽה׃ <S%H2299><s%> a sharp

ר֣וּמָה <S%H7311><s%> Be thou exalted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> O God עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [be] above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> [let] thy glory

רֶ֤שֶׁת ׀ <S%H7568><s%> a net הֵכִ֣ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> They have prepared לִפְעָמַי֮ <S%H6471><s%> for my steps כָּפַ֪ף <S%H3721><s%> is bowed down נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> my soul כָּר֣וּ <S%H3738><s%> they have digged לְפָנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before שִׁיחָ֑ה <S%H7882><s%> a pit נָפְל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> whereof they are fallen בְתוֹכָ֣הּ <S%H8432><s%> me into the midst סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> [themselves] Selah

נָ֘כ֤וֹן <S%H3559><s%> is fixed לִבִּ֣י <S%H3820><s%> My heart אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> is fixed לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> my heart אָ֝שִׁ֗ירָה <S%H7891><s%> I will sing וַאֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <S%H2167><s%> and give praise

ע֤וּרָה <S%H5782><s%> Awake up כְבוֹדִ֗י <S%H3519><s%> my glory ע֭וּרָֽה <S%H5782><s%> awake הַנֵּ֥בֶל <S%H5035><s%> psaltery וְכִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> and harp אָעִ֥ירָה <S%H5782><s%> I [myself] will awake שָּֽׁחַר׃ <S%H7837><s%> early

אוֹדְךָ֖ <S%H3034><s%> I will praise בָעַמִּ֥ים ׀ <S%H5971><s%> among the people אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> thee O Lord אֲ֝זַמֶּרְךָ֗ <S%H2167><s%> I will sing בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> among אֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> unto thee among the nations

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָדֹ֣ל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> unto the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> For thy mercy וְֽעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שְׁחָקִ֥ים <S%H7834><s%> unto the clouds אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> and thy truth

ר֣וּמָה <S%H7311><s%> Be thou exalted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> O God עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [be] above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> [let] thy glory
